subject: Football
Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: In the suit by 10 former N.H.L. players against the league for negligence and fraud, both sides will probably draw lessons from the N.F.L.’s concussion cases.
snippet: In the suit by 10 former N.H.L. players against the league for negligence and fraud, both sides will probably draw lessons from the N.F.L.’s concussion cases.
